summary: At the behest of an old and dear friend, playwright Lillian Hellman undertakes a dangerous mission to smuggle funds into Nazi Germany.
cast: Jane Fonda|Vanessa Redgrave|Jason Robards|Maximilian Schell|Hal Holbrook|Rosemary Murphy|Meryl Streep|Dora Doll|Elisabeth Mortensen|John Glover|Lisa Pelikan|Susan Jones|Cathleen Nesbitt|Maurice Denham|Mark Metcalf|Gérard Buhr|Stefan Gryff|Phillip Siegel|Molly Urquhart|Antony Carrick|Ann Queensberry|Edmond Bernard|Jacques David|Jacqueline Staup|Hans Verner|Christian de Tillière|Lambert Wilson|Jacques Disses|Lillian Hellman|Jim Kane|Don Koll|Francis Lemaire|Richard Marr|Ted Richert|Shane Rimmer|Vincent Sardi Jr.|Alan Webb
title: Julia
